1: A psalm of the Korahites. A song. His foundation is on holy mountains,
2: The Lord loves the gates[b] of Zion more than any dwelling in Jacob.
3: Glorious things are said of you, O city of God! Selah
4: Rahab and Babylon I count among those who know me. See, Philistia and Tyre, with Ethiopia, “This one was born there.”
5: [c]And of Zion it will be said: “Each one was born in it.” The Most High will establish it;
6: the Lord notes in the register of the peoples: “This one was born there.” Selah
7: So singers and dancers: “All my springs are in you.”
